result.title: UNIST ACM Training Introduction
result.content:
Hello everyone! I hope you are doing fine with your classes and student life. From this week we will start our weekly training. Each week:

  • I will create one "mash-up" contest with 4-5 selected problems from this website. Duration of contest will be about a week, deadline is always until Saturday.

  • Every Saturday we have meeting, where these problems will be discussed and explained.

  • Some weeks all problems will be related to one topic, but not always. First contest will have mixed problems from several topics to determine algorithm knowledge of students.

First contest is ready and will start at 16:00 30th of March. Problems are very easy, do your best to solve all of them. This Saturday (4th of April) we will have our first meeting and will discuss our future plans.

P.S. If you have any question or suggestions, please, write a comment here.
